message: I mis-placed a topic in the Tech group when it was more appropriate for Feedback, unfortunately there was no way to delete the topic even though there were no replies to it yet. It would be great to have a way to clean up these things when one finds she's messed up.
@vmbrasseur Upper right in a view of the topic, where the "Create new topic" button is, there should be a little grey x in a circle.
